roomTypes.description: A 40sqm modern room with luxury touch in every corner. Our Premier Room offers the most exclusive room and bathroom design with separated standing high pressure rain shower cabin and bath tub. This room also equipped with a 46’ LED interactive high definition television with more than 60 channels, I-Home docking station, electric power curtain, and to ensure your comfort, we also provide exclusively customized luxury linen with Egyptian cotton bed sheet, duvet, pillows, all stuffed with down feathers which were selected only from the gooses’ neck to get you through the night. • Aromatherapy Associates London luxurious amenities • Exclusively designed bedding with 100% goose down pillows and pillow menu • Exclusively customized luxury linen with 320 thread-count Egyptian cotton • Daily in-room fruit amenity • Personalized in-room entertainment program with more than 60 television channels • Electric power curtain • I-Home docking station • Electronic proximity key access system • Room temperature and humidity control • Mood lighting controls • Luxurious marble bathroom with separate bathtub and high pressure rain shower • 24 hours on-call STAR service • Laundry and dry cleaning service • 24 hours The Fitness Centre access • Express check-out service • 40 sqm

Room Inclusive breakfast for 2 adults and 2 children below 6 years old Premier Club Room has the same elegance features of the Premier Room and it is allowing you to enjoy our Private Reception service. This modern and luxury room will also give you the exclusive benefit by having the access to The Club Lounge, offering plenty of benefits and personalized service to our honourable guests. Enjoy a private breakfast experience with fascinating view from the highest floor of The Trans Luxury Hotel. Also, you can enjoy the exclusive private meeting rooms and even a personalized Butler service available upon request. All these facilities and service to ensure you will have the most memorable experience. Exclusive access to The Club Lounge Private Reception Acqua di Parma luxury amenities Exclusively designed pillows and pillow menu Exclusively customized luxury linen with 320 thread-count Egyptian cotton Daily in-room fruit amenity Electric power curtain I-Home docking station Electronic proximity key access system Room temperature and humidity control Mood lighting controls Luxurious marble bathroom with separate bathtub and high pressure rain shower 24 hours on-call STAR service 40 sqm

An elegant and luxurious suite with separate bedroom, spacious living room and dining area, Celebrity Suite is ideal for you who desire extra space. Not only you will have the access to experience our Private Reception services and access to The Club Lounge, this 95sqm room will surely escalate your stay with all the luxury things that you need including a 24 hours personal butler service. • Private Reception and in-room check-in • Exclusive access to The Club Lounge • 24 hours butler service • Acqua di Parma luxurious amenities • Exclusively designed bedding with 100% goose down pillows and pillow menu • Exclusively customized luxury linen with 320 thread-count Egyptian cotton • Daily in-room fruit amenity • Personalized in-room entertainment program with more than 60 television channels • Electric power curtain • I-Home docking station • Electronic proximity key access system • Room temperature and humidity control • Mood lighting controls • Luxurious marble bathroom with separate bathtub and high pressure rain shower • 24 hours on-call STAR service • Laundry and dry cleaning service • 24 hours The Fitness Centre access • Express check-out service • 95 sqm

cancellationPolicy.policyDescription: Rooms have a 24 hour cancellation policy. After that, guests will be charged the cost of their room.
